info.title: WebApplicationFirewallManagement
info.description: APIs to manage web application firewall rules.

get.description: List all the ExpressRoutePort resources in the specified subscription.
Gets all the available bgp service communities.
Gets all the express route circuits in a subscription.
Retrieves all the ExpressRouteCrossConnections in a subscription.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. For example, you can use $filter=name eq '{circuitServiceKey}'.

get.description: Lists ExpressRoute gateways under a given subscription.
Retrieves all the ExpressRouteProviderPorts in a subscription.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. For example, you can use $filter=location eq '{state}'.

get.description: Retrieves detail of a provider port.

parameters.name: providerport
parameters.description: The name of the provider port.

get.description: Gets all route filters in a subscription.
Gets all the service endpoint policies in a subscription.
